item.title: runge-kutta method
item.description: [1] [2] [3] [4] [5] notes Nikos Drakos, R. Sureshkumar, Michael Zeltkevic (translator), “Runge-Kutta Methods”, 10.001: Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations, 15 Apr 1998, url https://web.mit.edu/10.001/Web/Course_Notes/Differential_Equations_Notes/node5.html [20220322]. Eric W. Weisstein, “Runge-Kutta Method”, from MathWorld–A Wolfram Web Resource, Wolfram Research, Inc., 2022, url https://mathworld.wolfram.com/Runge-KuttaMethod.html [20220322].
